title: Entangle
content:
Entangle Level 1 Conjuration Spell Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them. 10 turns 3m 18m STR Save Concentration Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Conjuration Spell

Create a vine surface, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangling them.

3m 18m STR Save Concentration
